# User Prompts (chronological)

This file contains all the prompts and requests you have given during this project session, collected verbatim where possible.

## Application Required summery prompt
1. Goal
You must write detailed and reusable prompts that can generate five website sections.
Your focus is on:
Creating strong meta-prompts or section-specific prompts
Ensuring the prompts produce high-quality, good-looking UI every time
Using those prompts to actually generate the website sections


You are being tested on both prompt engineering skill and design sense.
Your final design must be responsive and look good on both desktop and mobile.
Sections You Must Cover
Your prompts must generate:
Navigation Bar
 (Brand name, links, responsive mobile menu)
Hero Section
 (Headline, subtext, CTA button, optional image/illustration)
Services / Features Section
 (3-6 items with icons or illustrations)
Contact / Lead Form
 (Form fields, labels, layout, basic validation structure)
Footer
 (Links, social icons, copyright, contact info)


Prompt Requirements (Important)
Your prompts must be:
Long, detailed, and structured
Reusable (should work every time, regardless of tool)
Clear meta-prompts or section-specific prompts
Able to produce:


2. Clean HTML/CSS (or Tailwind)
Responsive layouts
Neat spacing, good alignment, strong UI
Modern, visually appealing components


3. improve code qulity and create reusable component and constand folder and move all constant in this folder and create a utils folder and move utils function in this folder

4. improve design use animation where is required
